text: Joan Losada Gifra (born 20 June 1992) is a Spanish rugby sevens player. He was selected for Spain's rugby sevens team for the 2016 Summer Olympics in Brazil. He was part of the team that secured Spain the last spot in the Olympics for rugby sevens. == References == == External links == * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of Spain Category:Spain international rugby sevens players
title: Joan Losada
